title: Pantera
content:
does anybody here listen to pantera?[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://i11.photobucket.com/albums/a199/rorie1983/ironmaiden.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/font_downloads/iron_maiden.zip]Download the Iron Maiden font[/url]

title: Re: Pantera
content:
Pantera is cool, Dimebag was a really good guitarist, he wasn't god like some make him out to be. Although I really hate those "screams" Anselmo makes when he should be singing.

This Love, Cowboys from Hell, Walk & Cemetery Gates are great songs.
